name: codeping-pr-watcher
description: Alerts you when GitHub or GitHub Enterprise pull requests need your review with visual and audible cues.

commands.title: CodePing: Sign in to GitHub Enterprise

codeping.refreshIntervalSeconds.description: How often (in seconds) to check for new pull requests where you are a reviewer.

codeping.alerts.enableSound.description: Enable audible alerts when new review requests are found.

codeping.alerts.muted.description: Start muted. You can toggle mute via the command palette.

codeping.alerts.soundPath.description: Absolute path to a custom sound file for alerts. Leave empty to disable.
codeping.alerts.soundPath.markdownDescription: Absolute path to a custom sound file for alerts. Leave empty to disable. [Browse](command:codeping.chooseSoundFile)

codeping.github.enterpriseBaseUrl.description: Base URL for GitHub Enterprise (e.g. https://github.mycompany.com/api/v3). Leave blank to use public GitHub.

codeping.github.enterpriseTokenSecretNam.description: Secret storage key used to save the GitHub Enterprise token.

codeping.reminders.enabled.description: Show periodic reminders when you have open review requests.

codeping.reminders.intervalMinutes.description: How often (in minutes) to remind you about open review requests.

codeping.reminders.soundPath.description: Absolute path to a custom reminder sound. Leave empty to disable reminder sounds.
codeping.reminders.soundPath.markdownDescription: Absolute path to a custom reminder sound. Leave empty to disable reminder sounds. [Browse](command:codeping.chooseReminderSoundFile)

codeping.account.logout.markdownDescription: Use [CodePing: Sign out / Clear Credentials](command:codeping.logout) to remove stored tokens and reset authentication. (Value is ignored.)
codeping.account.logout.description: Convenience entry to sign out and clear stored credentials.
